channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m not looking to leave any money to the kids’: We’re in our 60s with $1.5 million in IRAs. Can we retire next year?
My husband and I are splitting our estate between his child and my three children. Should they get equal shares?
item.description: “We try to help all our kids when we can, yet push for self-sufficiency.”

item.title: You’ve just won the $1.5 billion Powerball jackpot. Here are the 5 money moves you need to make next.
item.description: But even if you’re not a big lottery winner in Saturday’s Powerball drawing, it’s still worth heeding this advice for managing a significant sum of mo...

item.title: I’m only 54 and my 401(k) plan is emailing me about buying annuities. Is this something I should do?
item.description: Options will keep coming, but signing up for an annuity is something you want to carefully consider

item.title: ‘I don’t know how much my wife earns’: I’m 63 with $6.4 million in stocks, mostly Apple. Will I get punished on taxes?
item.description: “Each of our properties are worth over $1 million.”

item.title: Wall Street's top stock picks for 2026: Mizuho’s under-the-radar name that could more than triple in value
item.description: Based on its 12-month price target, Mizuho sees shares of Vaxcyte soaring almost 300% from current levels.

item.title: Activist Ananym Capital urges LKQ to sell its European auto parts business
item.description: Divesting its European business means LKQ will be able to focus all its attention on its higher margin North American operations.
